verses.verse: וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer said אֱלֹהִים֙ <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him And God אֶֽל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to יַעֲקֹ֔ב <S%H3290><s%> ya-'a-Ko, unto Jacob ק֛וּם <S%H6965><s%> kum Arise עֲלֵ֥ה <S%H5927><s%> 'a-Leh go up בֵֽית־ veit- אֵ֖ל <S%H1008><s%> 'el to Bethel וְשֶׁב־ <S%H3427><s%> ve-shev- and dwell שָׁ֑ם <S%H8033><s%> Sham; there וַעֲשֵׂה־ <S%H6213><s%> va-'a-seh- there and make שָׁ֣ם <S%H8033><s%> sham there מִזְבֵּ֔חַ <S%H4196><s%> miz-Be-ach, there an altar לָאֵל֙ <S%H410><s%> la-'El unto God הַנִּרְאֶ֣ה <S%H7200><s%> han-nir-'Eh that appeared אֵלֶ֔יךָ <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lei-cha, to you בְּבָרְחֲךָ֔ <S%H1272><s%> be-va-re-cha-Cha, unto thee when thou fleddest מִפְּנֵ֖י <S%H6440><s%> mip-pe-Nei from the face עֵשָׂ֥ו <S%H6215><s%> 'e-Sav of Esau אָחִֽיךָ׃ <S%H251><s%> 'a-Chi-cha. thy brother

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer said יַעֲקֹב֙ <S%H3290><s%> ya-'a-Ko Then Jacob אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to his בֵּית֔וֹ <S%H1004><s%> bei-To, unto his household וְאֶ֖ל <S%H413><s%> ve-'El and to כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher who עִמּ֑וֹ <S%H5973><s%> im-Mo; with הָסִ֜רוּ <S%H5493><s%> ha-Si-ru and to all that [were] with him Put away אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- אֱלֹהֵ֤י <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei gods הַנֵּכָר֙ <S%H5236><s%> han-ne-Char the strange אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which בְּתֹכְכֶ֔ם <S%H8432><s%> be-to-che-Chem, that [are] among you וְהִֽטַּהֲר֔וּ <S%H2891><s%> ve-hit-ta-ha-Ru, and be clean וְהַחֲלִ֖יפוּ <S%H2498><s%> ve-ha-cha-Li-fu and change שִׂמְלֹתֵיכֶֽם׃ <S%H8071><s%> sim-lo-tei-Chem. your garments

וְנָק֥וּמָה <S%H6965><s%> ve-na-Ku-mah And let us arise וְנַעֲלֶ֖ה <S%H5927><s%> ve-na-'a-Leh and go up בֵּֽית־ beit- אֵ֑ל <S%H1008><s%> 'El; to Bethel וְאֶֽעֱשֶׂה־ <S%H6213><s%> ve-'e-'e-seh- and I will make שָּׁ֣ם <S%H8033><s%> sham there מִזְבֵּ֗חַ <S%H4196><s%> miz-Be-ach, there an altar לָאֵ֞ל <S%H410><s%> la-'El unto God הָעֹנֶ֤ה <S%H6030><s%> ha-'o-Neh who answered אֹתִי֙ <S%H853><s%> 'o-Ti בְּי֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> be-Yom me in the day צָֽרָתִ֔י <S%H6869><s%> tza-ra-Ti, of my distress וַיְהִי֙ <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi been עִמָּדִ֔י <S%H5978><s%> 'im-ma-Di, against בַּדֶּ֖רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> bad-De-rech and was with me in the way אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher I הָלָֽכְתִּי׃ <S%H1980><s%> ha-La-che-ti. which I went

וַיִּתְּנ֣וּ <S%H5414><s%> vai-yit-te-Nu And they gave אֶֽל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to יַעֲקֹ֗ב <S%H3290><s%> ya-'a-Ko, unto Jacob אֵ֣ת <S%H853><s%> 'et כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all אֱלֹהֵ֤י <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei gods הַנֵּכָר֙ <S%H5236><s%> han-ne-Char all the strange אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which בְּיָדָ֔ם <S%H3027><s%> be-ya-Dam, which [were] in their hand וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et הַנְּזָמִ֖ים <S%H5141><s%> han-ne-za-Mim and [all their] earrings אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which בְּאָזְנֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H241><s%> be-'a-ze-nei-Hem; which [were] in their ears וַיִּטְמֹ֤ן <S%H2934><s%> vai-yit-Mon hid אֹתָם֙ <S%H853><s%> 'o-Tam יַעֲקֹ֔ב <S%H3290><s%> ya-'a-Ko, and Jacob תַּ֥חַת <S%H8478><s%> Ta-chat under הָאֵלָ֖ה <S%H424><s%> ha-'e-Lah them under the oak אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> 'im- was near שְׁכֶֽם׃ <S%H7927><s%> she-Chem. which [was] by Shechem

וַיִּסָּ֑עוּ <S%H5265><s%> vai-yis-Sa-'u; And they journeyed וַיְהִ֣י׀ <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi become חִתַּ֣ת <S%H2847><s%> chit-Tat and the terror אֱלֹהִ֗ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him, of God עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- upon הֶֽעָרִים֙ <S%H5892><s%> he-'a-Rim was upon the cities אֲשֶׁר֙ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which סְבִיבֹ֣תֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H5439><s%> se-vi-Vo-tei-Hem, that [were] round about וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo did not רָֽדְפ֔וּ <S%H7291><s%> ra-de-Fu, them and they did not pursue אַחֲרֵ֖י <S%H310><s%> 'a-cha-Rei after בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei the sons יַעֲקֹֽב׃ <S%H3290><s%> ya-'a-Ko. of Jacob

וַיָּבֹ֨א <S%H935><s%> vai-ya-Vo came יַעֲקֹ֜ב <S%H3290><s%> ya-'a-Ko So Jacob ל֗וּזָה <S%H3870><s%> Lu-zah, to Luz אֲשֶׁר֙ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher who בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> be-'E-retz which [is] in the land כְּנַ֔עַן <S%H3667><s%> ke-Na-'an, of Canaan הִ֖וא <S%H1931><s%> hi he בֵּֽית־ beit- אֵ֑ל <S%H1008><s%> 'El; that [is] Bethel ה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> hu he וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> ve-chol and all הָעָ֥ם <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am he and all the people אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- who עִמּֽוֹ׃ <S%H5973><s%> im-Mo. with

וַיִּ֤בֶן <S%H1129><s%> vai-Yi-ven And he built שָׁם֙ <S%H8033><s%> sham there מִזְבֵּ֔חַ <S%H4196><s%> miz-Be-ach, there an altar וַיִּקְרָא֙ <S%H7121><s%> vai-yik-Ra and called לַמָּק֔וֹם <S%H4725><s%> lam-ma-Kom, the place אֵ֖ל <S%H410><s%> 'el God בֵּֽית־ beit- אֵ֑ל <S%H1008><s%> 'El; Beth-el כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> ki because שָׁ֗ם <S%H8033><s%> Sham, there נִגְל֤וּ <S%H1540><s%> nig-Lu appeared אֵלָיו֙ <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lav about הָֽאֱלֹהִ֔ים <S%H430><s%> ha-'E-lo-Him, because there God בְּבָרְח֖וֹ <S%H1272><s%> be-va-re-Cho unto him when he fled מִפְּנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> mip-pe-Nei from the face אָחִֽיו׃ <S%H251><s%> 'a-Chiv. of his brother

וַתָּ֤מָת <S%H4191><s%> vat-Ta-mot died דְּבֹרָה֙ <S%H1683><s%> de-vo-Rah But Deborah מֵינֶ֣קֶת <S%H3243><s%> mei-Ne-ket nurse רִבְקָ֔ה <S%H7259><s%> riv-Kah, Rebekah's וַתִּקָּבֵ֛ר <S%H6912><s%> vat-tik-ka-Ver and she was buried מִתַּ֥חַת <S%H8478><s%> mit-Ta-chat under לְבֵֽית־ le-veit- אֵ֖ל <S%H1008><s%> 'el beneath Bethel תַּ֣חַת <S%H8478><s%> Ta-chat under הָֽאַלּ֑וֹן <S%H437><s%> ha-'al-Lon; under an oak וַיִּקְרָ֥א <S%H7121><s%> vai-yik-Ra of it was called שְׁמ֖וֹ <S%H8034><s%> she-Mo and the name אַלּ֥וֹן al-Lon בָּכֽוּת׃ <S%H439><s%> ba-Chut. Allonbachuth פ Peh

וַיֵּרָ֨א <S%H7200><s%> vai-ye-Ra appeared אֱלֹהִ֤ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him And God אֶֽל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to יַעֲקֹב֙ <S%H3290><s%> ya-'a-Ko unto Jacob ע֔וֹד <S%H5750><s%> od, again בְּבֹא֖וֹ <S%H935><s%> be-vo-'O again when he came מִפַּדַּ֣ן mip-pad-Dan אֲרָ֑ם <S%H6307><s%> 'a-Ram; out of Padanaram וַיְבָ֖רֶךְ <S%H1288><s%> vay-Va-rech and blessed אֹתֽוֹ׃ <S%H853><s%> o-To.

וַיֹּֽאמֶר־ <S%H559><s%> vai-yo-mer- said ל֥וֹ lo אֱלֹהִ֖ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him And God שִׁמְךָ֣ <S%H8034><s%> shim-Cha unto him Thy name יַעֲקֹ֑ב <S%H3290><s%> ya-'a-Ko; [is] Jacob לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- shall no יִקָּרֵא֩ <S%H7121><s%> yik-ka-Re shall not be called שִׁמְךָ֨ <S%H8034><s%> shim-Cha thy name ע֜וֹד <S%H5750><s%> od longer יַעֲקֹ֗ב <S%H3290><s%> ya-'a-Ko, any more Jacob כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> ki for אִם־ <S%H518><s%> 'im- but יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El but Israel יִהְיֶ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> yih-Yeh to him שְׁמֶ֔ךָ <S%H8034><s%> she-Me-cha, shall be thy name וַיִּקְרָ֥א <S%H7121><s%> vai-yik-Ra and he called אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- שְׁמ֖וֹ <S%H8034><s%> she-Mo his name יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El. Israel

וַיֹּאמֶר֩ <S%H559><s%> vai-yo-Mer said ל֨וֹ lo אֱלֹהִ֜ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him And God אֲנִ֨י <S%H589><s%> 'a-Ni I am אֵ֤ל <S%H410><s%> 'el unto him I [am] God שַׁדַּי֙ <S%H7706><s%> shad-Dai Almighty פְּרֵ֣ה <S%H6509><s%> pe-Reh be fruitful וּרְבֵ֔ה <S%H7235><s%> u-re-Veh, and multiply גּ֛וֹי <S%H1471><s%> Goy a nation וּקְהַ֥ל <S%H6951><s%> u-ke-Hal and a company גּוֹיִ֖ם <S%H1471><s%> go-Yim of nations יִהְיֶ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> yih-Yeh shall come מִמֶּ֑ךָּ <S%H4480><s%> mi-Me-ka; at וּמְלָכִ֖ים <S%H4428><s%> u-me-la-Chim shall be of thee and kings מֵחֲלָצֶ֥יךָ <S%H2504><s%> me-cha-la-Tzei-cha out of thy loins יֵצֵֽאוּ׃ <S%H3318><s%> ye-Tze-'u. shall come

וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et הָאָ֗רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz, And the land אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which נָתַ֛תִּי <S%H5414><s%> na-Tat-ti which I gave לְאַבְרָהָ֥ם <S%H85><s%> le-'av-ra-Ham Abraham וּלְיִצְחָ֖ק <S%H3327><s%> u-le-yitz-Chak and Isaac לְךָ֣ le-Cha אֶתְּנֶ֑נָּה <S%H5414><s%> 'et-te-Nen-nah; to thee I will give it וּֽלְזַרְעֲךָ֥ <S%H2233><s%> u-le-zar-'a-Cha and to thy seed אַחֲרֶ֖יךָ <S%H310><s%> 'a-cha-Rei-cha after thee אֶתֵּ֥ן <S%H5414><s%> 'et-Ten will I give אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz. the land

וַיַּ֥עַל <S%H5927><s%> vai-Ya-'al went up מֵעָלָ֖יו <S%H5921><s%> me-'a-Lav Then אֱלֹהִ֑ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him; And God בַּמָּק֖וֹם <S%H4725><s%> bam-ma-Kom from him in the place אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- where דִּבֶּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> dib-Ber where he talked אִתּֽוֹ׃ <S%H854><s%> it-To. for

וַיַּצֵּ֨ב <S%H5324><s%> vai-yatz-Tzev set up יַעֲקֹ֜ב <S%H3290><s%> ya-'a-Ko And Jacob מַצֵּבָ֗ה <S%H4676><s%> matz-tze-Vah, a pillar בַּמָּק֛וֹם <S%H4725><s%> bam-ma-Kom in the place אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- where דִּבֶּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> dib-Ber where he talked אִתּ֖וֹ <S%H854><s%> it-To with מַצֶּ֣בֶת <S%H4678><s%> matz-Tze-vet with him [even] a pillar אָ֑בֶן <S%H68><s%> 'A-ven; of stone וַיַּסֵּ֤ךְ <S%H5258><s%> vai-yas-Sech and he poured עָלֶ֙יהָ֙ <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lei-ha out נֶ֔סֶךְ <S%H5262><s%> Ne-sech, a drink offering וַיִּצֹ֥ק <S%H3332><s%> vai-yi-Tzok thereon and he poured עָלֶ֖יהָ <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lei-ha and שָֽׁמֶן׃ <S%H8081><s%> Sha-men. oil

וַיִּקְרָ֨א <S%H7121><s%> vai-yik-Ra called יַעֲקֹ֜ב <S%H3290><s%> ya-'a-Ko And Jacob אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- שֵׁ֣ם <S%H8034><s%> shem the name הַמָּק֗וֹם <S%H4725><s%> ham-ma-Kom, of the place אֲשֶׁר֩ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher after דִּבֶּ֨ר <S%H1696><s%> dib-Ber spake אִתּ֥וֹ <S%H854><s%> it-To for שָׁ֛ם <S%H8033><s%> sham in it אֱלֹהִ֖ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him where God בֵּֽית־ beit- אֵֽל׃ <S%H1008><s%> 'El. with him Bethel

וַיִּסְעוּ֙ <S%H5265><s%> vai-yis-'U And they journeyed מִבֵּ֣ית mib-Beit אֵ֔ל <S%H1008><s%> 'El, from Bethel וַֽיְהִי־ <S%H1961><s%> vay-hi- there was ע֥וֹד <S%H5750><s%> od and there was but כִּבְרַת־ <S%H3530><s%> kiv-rat- a little הָאָ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz way לָב֣וֹא <S%H935><s%> la-Vo to come אֶפְרָ֑תָה <S%H672><s%> 'ef-Ra-tah; to Ephrath וַתֵּ֥לֶד <S%H3205><s%> vat-Te-led travailed רָחֵ֖ל <S%H7354><s%> ra-Chel and Rachel וַתְּקַ֥שׁ <S%H7185><s%> vat-te-Kash and she had hard בְּלִדְתָּֽהּ׃ <S%H3205><s%> be-lid-Tah. labour

וַיְהִ֥י <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi was in בְהַקְשֹׁתָ֖הּ <S%H7185><s%> ve-hak-sho-Tah And it came to pass when she was in hard בְּלִדְתָּ֑הּ <S%H3205><s%> be-lid-Tah; labour וַתֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vat-To-mer said לָ֤הּ lah הַמְיַלֶּ֙דֶת֙ <S%H3205><s%> ham-yal-Le-det that the midwife אַל־ <S%H408><s%> 'al- not תִּ֣ירְאִ֔י <S%H3372><s%> tir-'I, unto her Fear כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for גַם־ <S%H1571><s%> gam- again זֶ֥ה <S%H2088><s%> zeh he לָ֖ךְ lach בֵּֽן׃ <S%H1121><s%> Ben. not thou shalt have this son
